name: .GTM File Extension
summary: Learn about .GTM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by GreekToMe, a Greek New Testament study program; saves a New Testament Bible translation (e.g., KJV, ESV, etc.) provided for use with the GreekToMe software; contains both Greek words and their translations.

content: Although the translation data in GTM files is displayed in plain text in the program, the data is encrypted to ensure integrity when loading the file. Even changing the filename makes the file unusable.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .gtm file in GPS TrackMaker
images.caption: GTM file open in GPS TrackMaker
